def_cn: (美国小城镇的)大街，主街
def_en: In small towns in the United States, the street where most of the shops are is often called Main Street .

def_cn: （新闻用语，指居住在小城镇的或并不富裕的）普通大众，老百姓
def_en: Main Street is used by journalists to refer to the ordinary people of America who live in small towns rather than big cities or are not very rich.
